name: githyanki-knight-xmm
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of githyanki-knight-xmm, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, cosmic surrealism, impossible geometries, starfield grain, indigo glows, palette: indigos, violets, black, cold silver, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of githyanki-knight-xmm with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Generate a fantasy-themed painting in a consistent painterly style, using a three-color palette of indigos, violets, black, and cold silver. The painting should depict an underwater/sky merged zone filled with cosmic surrealism and impossible geometries. Stars should be scattered throughout, creating a grainy effect as they twinkle, and indigo should glow mysteriously. Central to this scene is a muscular figure stylized as a fantasy knight. This knight of a Githyanki design should be equipped with culturally coherent gear consistent with a grounded medieval fantasy theme. There should be no modern tech, anime style, bloom glare or signage present. Aim to bring out the unique limb structure and the musculature of the knight. Position a human silhouette for size comparison. The painting should be filled with a sense of movement â€“ yet devoid of any text, random letter strings, or meaningless symbols unless otherwise specified. This should resemble detailed concept art without any noticeable artifacts. Preserve the specified aspect/resolution.
